text.name: function_EDGE_Sign
text.text: This sign will earn you a small amount of advertisement revenue.

text.name: function_WaterWell
text.text: A well where you can get free water

text.name: function_MultiSellingStation
text.text: Here you can sell anything you'd like, From crop harvest to seeds and fertilizer.

text.name: function_multifillingstation
text.text: Here you can buy anything you'd like, the delivery people take 10%, and 15% on any crop harvest.

text.name: function_StrawBarn_SellingSpot
text.text: Nice and clean barn that works as a selling point for straw, grass, hay and silage. The Building is fitted with automatic lighting inside and outside.

text.name: function_StrawBarn_SellingSpotUn
text.text: Nice and clean barn that works as a selling point for all types of Fruit. The Building is fitted with automatic lighting inside and outside.

text.name: function_greenScreen
text.text: You can place this wall in the background for shop phots. There is Also a Ground Paint in this color.
